message:
Guys,

What's the best self hosted script to run email marketing campaigns, we all know MailChimp, CampaignMonitor .etc which gets freaking expensive if you have a lot of subscribers, we used this simple script http://codecanyon.net/item/newsletter-system/52667 but it was very very elementary with few tracking options.

I'm looking for a self-hosted email newsletter system with a bit more advanced options that preferably can work with Wordpress.

This seems like a hot option:
http://codecanyon.net/item/mymail-email-newsletter-plugin-for-wordpress/3078294

What do you think?
story: Abdo Magdy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
